title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7305.7 - Personal hygiene and clothing issue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7305.7 - Personal hygiene and clothing issue

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with the requirements of Part
7312 of this Title, all youth shall be provided, at admission, with an issue of
personal hygiene items. (b) Clothing shall be issued to youth when requested or required pursuant to the
requirements of Part 7312 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7305.7

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
